title: un pAdam adanaiyE
sahitya:
un pAdam adanaiyE ennidayam adanil eNNit-tudikkum enakkaruL murugA


anupallavi

  pan murai dinamtOrum bhakti paravashattODu un tirunAmam Odi uLLam urugiDuvEn


caraNam    enna kurai endanukku irundAlum adu tIra unnaruLai vArit-tandu udavi purindiDAyO
cennai nagar vAsanAi ennarumai nEsanAi serinda kAruNyam niraindu sirandOnE
